summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PoE 2 Passive Skill Tree Planner with focus on interactive features. All major functionality working perfectly including node allocation, visual feedback, tooltips, and clean chain-like connections.
passed_tests: Build Planner page loads at /en/build-planner without errors
Canvas skill tree renders with 2,552 nodes
Connections form clean chain-like paths (not chaotic web)
Node allocation works when clicking on nodes (tested and confirmed)
Allocated nodes show golden highlighting (visually confirmed)
Connected paths between allocated nodes are highlighted
Zoom controls work (zoom in, zoom out, reset)
Node tooltip displays on hover with detailed stats (confirmed with 'Grit' notable)
Points counter updates when nodes are allocated (0→1 confirmed)
Class selector dropdown works (Witch to Ranger tested)
Homepage loads at /en without errors
Search functionality works with node highlighting (damage search tested)
Path mode toggle button functions correctly
Level input field works (tested 100→50)
Build name input field works (tested name change)
Professional PoE 2 game-accurate visual design with cosmic background
Clean UI with proper spacing and collapsible stat sections
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
No JavaScript errors detected during testing
Navigation between homepage and build planner works seamlessly
